author: Arc13

text:
Holy...
I think you can see my interests or something...
This is around the 4th or 5th time now I've seen a game, looked at it, been interested but would only consider checking it out if I got something just shown to me, rather than do deep research to be disappointed.
And then YOU go and upload a video of exactly what I was considering checking out!
This is Grade A example. Yesterday I saw this game, thought if I had some time in my schedule I could check it out. And then you upload this.
author: Arc13

author: SupraDarky

text: This game is basically a tribute to old school classics, mainly Zelda. It has dungeons (water, fire, forest etc.) and those awesome loading screens shown in the video (there are tons more). The music is greatly inspired by them as well, like the one where you name your character which sounds extremely like Intermezzo from Dragon Quest.
author: SupraDarky
